title: Alex Oundo
text: Alex Oundo (born 10 December 1943) is a Kenyan <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201964%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1964 Summer Olympics, he defeated <a href="Bruno%20Arcari%20%28boxer%29">Bruno Arcari</a> of Italy, before losing to <a href="J%C3%B3zef%20Grudzie%C5%84">Józef Grudzień</a> of Poland.
